com.broadcom.bt.le.api
Class BleClientService

java.lang.Object
  com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleClientService

public abstract class BleClientService
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a low energy service in the client role.

This is a base class implementing a BLE service, that an application should override to implement a new service. A client service is identified by a unique UUID and provides * access to characteristics and descriptors provided by a remote device.

A BleClientService derived service is usually assigned to a BleClientProfile as a required or optional service.

Method Detail

getAllCharacteristics

public java.util.ArrayList<BleCharacteristic> getAllCharacteristics(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
Retrieves an array of all characteristics included in this service. The characteristics and descriptors are read when this service is refreshed using the refresh function.

onCharacteristicChanged

public void onCharacteristicChanged(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice,
                                    BleCharacteristic characteristic)
Callback indicating a remote characteristic has changed. This callback is invoked if the local device has registered for notifications from the remote server.

See Also:
registerForNotification(BluetoothDevice, int, com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleGattID)

onSetCharacteristicAuthRequirement

public void onSetCharacteristicAuthRequirement(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice,
                                               BleCharacteristic characteristic,
                                               int instanceID)
Callback invoked when a service requires the authorization requirement for a given characteristic to be set. An application should call BleCharacteristic.setAuthReq(byte) for the provided characteristic to set the required level of authorization.

public void onWriteCharacteristicComplete(int status,
                                          BluetoothDevice remoteDevice,
                                          BleCharacteristic characteristic)
Called to indicate a write operation to a characteristic on a remote device has competed.

readCharacteristic

public int readCharacteristic(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice,
                              BleCharacteristic characteristic)
Refreshes a given characteristic from the remote device. This method updates the given characteristic value and descriptors from the remote device.

See Also:
onReadCharacteristicComplete(BluetoothDevice, com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleCharacteristic)

refresh

public void refresh(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
Refreshes all remote characteristics for all instances of this service.

This method will determine all characteristics provided by a given service on the remote device and update all accessible values in the service.

The onRefreshComplete(BluetoothDevice) callback is triggered after all characteristics have been refreshed.

See Also:
onRefreshComplete(BluetoothDevice)

registerForNotification

public int registerForNotification(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice,
                                   int instanceID,
                                   BleGattID characteristicID)
Registers for notification from the server for this service.

unregisterNotification

public int unregisterNotification(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice,
                                  int instanceID,
                                  BleGattID characteristicID)
Unregister for notification from the server for this service.

writeCharacteristic

public int writeCharacteristic(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice,
                               int instanceId,
                               BleCharacteristic characteristic)
Writes to a characteristic on a remote device.

This function determines if the characteristic have been modified and issues the necessary write commands.

Once the characteristic write completes, the onWriteCharacteristicComplete(int, BluetoothDevice, com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleCharacteristic) callback is invoked.

Parameters:
remoteDevice - Identifies the remote device to write to.
instanceId - Instance id of this service.
characteristic - Characteristic to be written
Returns:
BleConstants.GATT_SUCCESS if the write operation was initiated successfully
See Also:
onWriteCharacteristicComplete(int, BluetoothDevice, com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleCharacteristic)
